name: Kevin Ravensberg
cooked: With JoinMarket there are people that make their bitcoin available as a Maker and then people who want to do a coinjoin (named Taker) select from several Makers and pay them a certain percentage or flat fee for their liquidity. Makers are ideally online all the time, where takers only interact with them when they coordinate their own coinjoin.
topic_title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
topic_html_title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
raw: With JoinMarket there are people that make their bitcoin available as a Maker and then people who want to do a coinjoin (named Taker) select from several Makers and pay them a certain percentage or flat fee for their liquidity. Makers are ideally online all the time, where takers only interact with them when they coordinate their own coinjoin.
